snippet: President Vladimir Putin of Russia needs to know that continued moves to destabilize Ukraine or aggressively extend Russia’s reach will not go unanswered.
abstract: Editorial supports Pres Obama's decision to commit $1 billion to bolster security in Central and Eastern Europe; holds move signals to both Russia and NATO allies America's willingness to help Central and Eastern European nations subject to Russia's aggression; warns signaling commitment to defend allies while avoiding increasing tensions with Russia may prove challenging.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir Putin of Russia needs to know that continued moves to destabilize Ukraine or aggressively extend Russia’s reach will not go unanswered.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
